thread.title: Zach Bryan's marriage confirmed as singer shares first wedding photo with Samantha Leonard - The Economic Times
thread.title_full: Zach Bryan's marriage confirmed as singer shares first wedding photo with Samantha Leonard - The Economic Times

title: Zach Bryan's marriage confirmed as singer shares first wedding photo with Samantha Leonard - The Economic Times
text: Zach Bryan and Samantha Leonard are officially married. The country music star confirmed his marriage to Leonard after a video surfaced online showing the newlyweds leaving in a car decorated with “Just Married” flags on Wednesday, December 31. The development has answered the question many fans were asking online: did Zach Bryan get married?Zach Bryan wedding photo posted on InstagramThe confirmation came when Bryan, 29, shared the first official photo from his wedding on Instagram on December 31. The image shows Bryan holding Leonard, 28, as she wears a strapless white gown featuring a feather-trimmed hem. “Tougher than the rest,” Bryan captioned the post, referencing Bruce Springsteen’s love song from the 1987 album Tunnel of Love.The post also included a video from the celebration, showing Bryan on stage surrounded by flowers as he covers the song.‘Is Zach Bryan married?’ fans get their answerWith the Instagram post, fans searching “is Zach Bryan married” now have confirmation. The wedding follows weeks of speculation fueled by social media posts and public appearances by the couple.Wedding hints dropped a day earlierA day before sharing the wedding photo, the “Something in the Orange” singer posted a separate Instagram image featuring himself and friends dressed in formal wear.The caption quoted lyrics from the Black Eyed Peas’ hit song: Tonight’s the night, let’s live it up/I got my money, let’s spend it up (I feel)/Go out and smash it, like, 'Oh my God!'/Jump off that sofa, let’s kick it off (I feel), he captioned the post.Samantha Leonard and Zach Bryan's relationship timelineWhen Leonard was seen wearing a diamond ring on her left hand in a video that Bryan uploaded to Instagram Stories, the couple's engagement rumors began to circulate.In July 2025, Bryan and Leonard were first connected when Leonard shared a picture of the two of them at the Running of the Bulls in Spain in an Instagram slideshow. On August 21, Leonard posted pictures of the couple on Instagram, showing them vacationing together. In one picture, the couple was seen holding a fishing rod while embracing on a boat.
